display.title: Alchemical Chest
display.description:
A practicing alchemist is always busy conducting new experiments. Having found the wooden chests provided by the powers that be unsuitable, you develop a new Alchemical Chest, capable of storing 104 stacks of items, compared to the double wooden chest's 72 stacks. 

Unencumbered by the limitations of this plane of existence the Alchemical Chest can still be accessed even when a solid block covers it. The Covalence Dust sprinkled on the lid also gives the chest weak magical power, allowing certain magical items to produce an effect when placed in the Chest.

Black Hole Band - Sucks nearby items into the chest
Gem of Eternal Density - Compresses materials in the chest into materials of higher EMC value
Talisman of Repair - Repairs items inside the chest
